title: The Scarlet Letter- Chapter 21
description:
Phoebe reads a chapter a day of Nathaniel Hawthorne’s The Scarlet Letter. Read along.

Our other shows are Criminal and This is Love.

Donate to Phoebe Reads a Mystery.
